account_not_found.message: Please check your credentials and try again.

auth_pwd_reset_step_three.message: Follow instructions to regain access to your account

auth_pwd_reset_step_two.message: Wait for your recovery details to be sent

checkin_instructions_one.message: We use QR codes to help attendees check in to an event. Be sure to print or share the QR  code with your event attendance organizer.

checkin_instructions_three.message: You can view attendance statistics on your control panel. Be sure to come back to view attendee feedback and event ratings.

checkin_instructions_two.message: Attendees can check in by scanning the QR code with the app. QR Codes can be printed or shown directly on a laptop, phone or tablet screen

email_does_not_exist.message: I'm sorry, but we weren't able to find a user with that login information

links_delete_modal_body.message: Are you sure you want to delete link name?

lost_password_success.message: Thanks! Please check %s for a link to reset your password.

password_requirements_length.message: Your password must contain at least 6 characters.

password_requirements_special_char.message: For added security, use numbers, letters and special characters such as @, #, $, &, etc

password_reset_success.message: Password saved, redirecting you to the login page
